name: After-Venture
description:
After-Venture is a prototype game which rotates around the trial and error mechanic.

You are an unknown adventurer who is set up for different crazy adventure by an unknown guy who keeps sending you letters about your next task, describing where you'll have to go and  asking you to retrieve a certain object while on your mission.

You have to prepare yuor suitcase carefully, basing your decisions about what item to put in your suitcase, on the hints that you find written inside the letters.

After every adventure you'll see the result through funny selfies that the adventurer took during the trip and based on how the selfies will result, you'll know if you succeeded on your mission or terribly failed it.

No worries! Try it again, pick different items and see the result! You'll know when the adventurer will manage to reach the wanted object.

(Please if you play the game, feel free to leave a comment or a feedback!)
